name: NCAA Conference Realignment
description: R Shiny app I developed allowing users to create their own NCAA Division 1 conferences

name: NCAA Basketball Game Predictions
description: R Shiny app showing XGBoost generated predictions for every men's and women's game in 2021 NCAA season. (Model created with help of Tiffany Tseng, Tina Wang, Michael Mayor, and Brock Gallagher)

name: Relationship Between Demographics and 2016 Election
description: Using linear models to explore relationship between county level demographics and voting outcomes in 2016 U.S. presidential election. (Model created with help of Tiffany Tseng, Tina Wang, Michael Mayor, and Brock Gallagher)

name: Analyzing Sales Performance for Daily Media Blitz
description: Using Tableau to visualize sales performance for a media company as they transition toward digital distribution streams. (Project created with help of Tiffany Tseng, Tina Wang, Michael Mayor, and Brock Gallagher)

name: 2017 Forbes Top 200 Performance Analysis
description: Comparing performance of the 2017 top 200 companies as rated by Forbes across countries, sectors, and industries.

name: Analyzing Phone Call Data
description: Using Tableau to visualize length of phone calls with each of my parents over time

name: Launching a new beverage brand for AB InBev
description: PowerPoint slide deck detailing proposal for a new AB InBev beverage launch. (Project created with help of Sam Yoo, Zubair Johal, Alex Aguilera, Joe Castellucia, and Trae Long)
